title: Park Hyatt Saigon reopens
text:
July 18, 2015 10:42 am 
Park Hyatt Saigon Hotel One of the focuses of this renovation was the pool and the outdoor garden which have been truly transformed into a green oasis of peace in the middle of the bustling city of Saigon. Park Hyatt Saigon Hotel is now ready to welcome back guests following a three-month closure for renovation. All restaurants - Square One, Opera and Park Lounge at the hotel have opened their doors with brand new menus, offerings and dishes. Its 245 rooms and suites have a refreshing white coat and luxurious artistic elements infused by Vietnamese artworks. They perfectly blend traditional comforts with latest modern technologies like in-room iPads, Nespresso machines, sensor lighting system and more. One of the focuses of this renovation was the pool and the outdoor garden which have been truly transformed into a green oasis of peace in the middle of the bustling city of Saigon. An innovative meeting concept that is unique and first-of-its-kind in the city will be introduced together with new venues for events and functions. The display of traditional Vietnamese artworks and photography in every corner of the hotel allows guests clearly feel Vietnamese culture being expressed and shared in every step they make. Personal skills and knowledge of the hotel’s staff were further enhanced to make certain that a journey with unique and intimate experiences unfolds when guests return to the hotel. — VNS 162 Viewed
